txt.en: Use the Call Radhril skill and talk to Radhril

'Let us tread carefully. There are many foes lurking about Cotfast. I hope that we can recover most of the stolen goods as well as free all of the forest creatures the denizens of the village have caged. I am ready when you are, [placeholder].'
Use the summoning horn at the western entrance to Cotfast to summon Radhril to your side.
You should talk to Radhril.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>If Radhril is missing, and the Call Radhril skill is not available, try using the /pet release command.</rgb>
You should retrieve stolen goods and free caged animals at Cotfast.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>If Radhril is missing, and the Call Radhril skill is not available, try using the /pet release command.</rgb>
You have been tasked with thwarting the efforts of foes dwelling in the village of Cotfast.
'I commend your efforts, [placeholder]! Come, let us return and report our success to the Free Peoples.'
You should return to entrance to Cotfast.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>If Radhril is missing, and the Call Radhril skill is not available, try using the /pet release command.</rgb>
Return to the western entrance of Cotfast
